BezierToolkit class

version: Documentation not provided.

description:

Offers common used methods for bezier curves. Used by QuadCurve, CubicCurve, MoveOnQuadCurve, MoveOnCubicCurve

usage:

var myBezierToolkit:BezierToolkit = new BezierToolkit();

BezierToolkit Methods:

description: Documentation not provided.

parameters:

  • targ (Number)
  • p1 (Object)
  • p2 (Object)
  • p3 (Object)

returns: Object

description: Documentation not provided.

usage: myInstance.getQuadControlPoints(startX, startY, x2, y2, endX, endY);

getCubicControlPoints

description: if anybody finds a generic method to compute control points for bezier curves with n control points, if only the points on the curve are given, please let me know!

usage: myInstance.getCubicControlPoints(startX, startY, throughX1, throughY1, throughX2, throughY2, endX, endY);

parameters:

  • targ (Number)
  • startX (Number)
  • startY (Number)
  • throughX1 (Number)
  • throughY1 (Number)
  • throughX2 (Number)
  • throughY2 (Number)
  • endX (Number)
  • endY (Number)

returns: Object
